Sentencas: Electrical energy storage (EES) is necessary to enable greater penetration of renewables and as a grid-balancing solution, but current EES technologies suffer from capacity or geological limitations and high cost.
Titulo: Reversible solid oxide cell systems for integration with natural gas pipeline and carbon capture infrastructure for grid energy management

Sentencas: Reversible solid oxide cells (ReSOCs) are an electrochemical energy conversion technology that can produce both electricity from fuel (gas-to-power) and fuel from electricity (power-to-gas), depending on resource availability and demand.
Titulo: Reversible solid oxide cell systems for integration with natural gas pipeline and carbon capture infrastructure for grid energy management

Sentencas: Leveraging in situ C-O-H chemistry and operating at intermediate temperature (600 degrees C) and elevated pressure (10-20 bar) enables these cells to be mildly exothermic, eliminating the need for external heat input or high over-potential (low-efficiency) operation during electrolysis mode.
Titulo: Reversible solid oxide cell systems for integration with natural gas pipeline and carbon capture infrastructure for grid energy management

Sentencas: This operating strategy also results in higher methane production during electrolysis, facilitating easier integration with natural gas pipeline infrastructure over steam/hydrogen electrolytic processes.
Titulo: Reversible solid oxide cell systems for integration with natural gas pipeline and carbon capture infrastructure for grid energy management

Sentencas: This study proposes a ReSOC system integrated with both natural gas pipeline and carbon capture and storage (CCS) infrastructure to render a flexible, grid energy management resource.
Titulo: Reversible solid oxide cell systems for integration with natural gas pipeline and carbon capture infrastructure for grid energy management

Sentencas: In gas-to-power mode, the system takes natural gas from a pipeline to produce electricity.
Titulo: Reversible solid oxide cell systems for integration with natural gas pipeline and carbon capture infrastructure for grid energy management

Sentencas: Un-utilized fuel is combusted with oxygen and expanded through a turbine to produce more power.
Titulo: Reversible solid oxide cell systems for integration with natural gas pipeline and carbon capture infrastructure for grid energy management

Sentencas: The water in the exhaust is condensed, and the remaining carbon dioxide is compressed for tanker or pipeline transportation to a carbon sequestration site.
Titulo: Reversible solid oxide cell systems for integration with natural gas pipeline and carbon capture infrastructure for grid energy management

Sentencas: In power-to-gas mode, carbon dioxide and water are co-electrolyzed in the stack to produce methane and hydrogen, which can be injected directly into a natural gas pipeline or further refined into a purer stream of methane.
Titulo: Reversible solid oxide cell systems for integration with natural gas pipeline and carbon capture infrastructure for grid energy management

Sentencas: We explore system design concepts, performance, and cost of a 50 MWe ReSOC system.
Titulo: Reversible solid oxide cell systems for integration with natural gas pipeline and carbon capture infrastructure for grid energy management

Sentencas: Results indicate that synthetic natural gas (92.0% methane) can be produced at $22.7/MMBTU with a lower heating value efficiency of 81%.
Titulo: Reversible solid oxide cell systems for integration with natural gas pipeline and carbon capture infrastructure for grid energy management

Sentencas: Alternatively, a system that net meters produced syngas and operates in power producing mode 50% of the time can generate electricity at a levelized cost of 10.5(sic)/kWh with an efficiency of 69% (LHV), while producing exhaust that is 95.5% carbon dioxide at 40 bar.
Titulo: Reversible solid oxide cell systems for integration with natural gas pipeline and carbon capture infrastructure for grid energy management

Sentencas: If the system operates disproportionally in gas-to-power mode the LCOE drops to near 6 cent/kWh.
Titulo: Reversible solid oxide cell systems for integration with natural gas pipeline and carbon capture infrastructure for grid energy management

Sentencas: The economic outlook for mature ReSOC systems presented herein are found to be competitive with current energy storage technologies and natural gas peaker plants.
Titulo: Reversible solid oxide cell systems for integration with natural gas pipeline and carbon capture infrastructure for grid energy management
